# Ranielli Montagna

> Full Stack Developer from Brazil specializing in React, Next.js, Node.js and TypeScript. Portfolio, blog and open source projects.

Ranielli Montagna (also known as Rani Montagna or Ranni Montagna) is a Brazilian Full Stack Developer with over 3 years of experience building web and mobile applications. He works at Luizalabs (a technology division of Magazine Luiza, one of the largest retailers in Brazil) and specializes in creating high-quality digital experiences using modern JavaScript technologies.

## Identity

- Full name: Ranielli Montagna
- Also known as: Rani Montagna, Ranni Montagna, Ranielli
- Nationality: Brazilian
- Location: Brazil
- Role: Full Stack Developer
- Employer: Luizalabs - Magazine Luiza
- GitHub: https://github.com/RanielliMontagna
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/rannimontagna
- Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/rannimontagna

## Skills

- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, React Native
- Backend: Node.js, REST APIs, GraphQL, PostgreSQL
- Tools: Figma, Git, Docker
- Languages: Portuguese (native), English (professional)

## Portfolio

- [Portfolio & Home](https://ranimontagna.com): Main portfolio page of Ranielli Montagna with about, experience, skills and contact sections
- [Blog](https://ranimontagna.com/blog): Technical blog with articles on React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript and web development best practices
- [Projects](https://ranimontagna.com/projects): Open source projects and GitHub repositories by Ranielli Montagna

## Blog

The blog at https://ranimontagna.com/blog contains technical articles authored by Ranielli Montagna covering:
- React and Next.js development
- Node.js and backend architecture
- TypeScript patterns and best practices
- UI/UX design for developers
- Web performance and modern tooling

For a full list of blog posts with descriptions, see: https://ranimontagna.com/llms-full.txt

This site is available in three languages:

- English: https://ranimontagna.com/en
